intro: Afrosolen erongoensis, commonly known as the Erongo lily, is a flowering plant native to Namibia. It belongs to the Amaryllidaceae family and is characterized by its striking, white to pale pink flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky, well-drained soils and is adapted to arid environments. Its leaves are strap-shaped and often persist through dry periods. Afrosolen erongoensis is notable for its ornamental value and is sometimes cultivated in gardens for its aesthetic appeal.
